title: iboss - Logs Overview
description: This dashboard provides insights into logged activities, alerts, and system actions generated based on network traffic, policy enforcement, user behavior, and threat detection.

definition.content:
**[iboss](https://www.iboss.com/)** provides secure internet access and Zero Trust enforcement for users anywhere. It combines key security functions such as Secure Web Gateway (SWG), CASB, ZTNA, and DLP into a single, scalable solution. Traffic is routed through iboss's infrastructure to ensure consistent policy enforcement and threat protection.

This dashboard provides insights into logged activities, alerts, and system actions generated based on network traffic, policy enforcement, user behavior, and threat detection.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using iboss logs forwarded via a [Datadog Agent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent).
- Please follow the **Installation** and **Configuration** steps [here](/integrations/iboss) to enable log collection.

definition.title: Web Traffic Events by Action Over Time
DLP Events by Action Over Time

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates **iboss** events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
